plot: Documentary following the creators of the Muppets as they collaborate with a humanitarian aid worker on a series of puppet shows that teach children in third world countries about dangers as varied as land mines and tsunamis.
title: No Strings
plot_es: Documentary following the creators of the Muppets as they collaborate with a humanitarian aid worker on a series of puppet shows that teach children in third world countries about dangers as varied as land mines and tsunamis.
plot_en: Documentary following the creators of the Muppets as they collaborate with a humanitarian aid worker on a series of puppet shows that teach children in third world countries about dangers as varied as land mines and tsunamis.
